name: React Basics
description: Introduction to the basics of React, including components, JSX, and state.

lessons.name: What is React?
lessons.description: An overview of React and its core principles.

lessons.name: JSX and Rendering
lessons.description: Understanding JSX and rendering elements in React.

lessons.name: State and Props
lessons.description: Managing state and passing data through props.

name: React Lifecycle and Hooks
description: Learn about React component lifecycle and hooks for managing state and effects.

lessons.name: Lifecycle Methods
lessons.description: Understanding the component lifecycle in React.

lessons.name: Using Hooks
lessons.description: Introduction to React hooks like useState and useEffect.

lessons.name: Custom Hooks
lessons.description: Creating and using custom hooks in React.

name: React Routing
description: Implementing routing in a React application.

lessons.name: React Router
lessons.description: Setting up routing in React using React Router.

lessons.name: Route Parameters
lessons.description: Using dynamic route parameters in React Router.

lessons.name: Nested Routes
lessons.description: Creating nested routes in a React application.

name: Python Basics
description: Introduction to Python programming and basic syntax.

lessons.name: Variables and Data Types
lessons.description: Learn about Python variables, data types, and type conversion.

lessons.name: Conditionals and Loops
lessons.description: Control flow using if-else statements and loops.

lessons.name: Functions
lessons.description: Understanding and creating Python functions.

name: Data Structures in Python
description: Introduction to Python data structures such as lists, tuples, and dictionaries.

lessons.name: Lists and Tuples
lessons.description: Working with lists and tuples in Python.

lessons.name: Dictionaries and Sets
lessons.description: Understanding Python dictionaries and sets.

lessons.name: List Comprehension
lessons.description: Using list comprehension for concise code.

name: File Handling in Python
description: Learn how to work with files in Python.

lessons.name: Reading and Writing Files
lessons.description: Basic file handling in Python.

lessons.name: Working with JSON
lessons.description: Reading and writing JSON data in Python.

lessons.name: File Handling Best Practices
lessons.description: Understanding the best practices for handling files in Python.

name: Introduction to Logic
description: An introduction to propositional and predicate logic.

lessons.name: Propositional Logic
lessons.description: Understanding the basics of propositional logic.

lessons.name: Predicate Logic
lessons.description: Diving into predicate logic and quantifiers.

lessons.name: Logical Equivalences
lessons.description: Understanding logical equivalences and reasoning.

name: Sets and Functions
description: Learn about set theory and functions in discrete math.

lessons.name: Set Theory
lessons.description: Introduction to sets, subsets, and set operations.

lessons.name: Functions and Relations
lessons.description: Understanding functions, relations, and mappings.

lessons.name: Cartesian Products
lessons.description: Working with Cartesian products and power sets.

name: Counting and Probability
description: Fundamentals of counting techniques and probability theory.

lessons.name: Permutations and Combinations
lessons.description: Learn about different counting techniques.

lessons.name: Probability
lessons.description: Understanding basic probability theory.

lessons.name: Bayes' Theorem
lessons.description: Introduction to Bayes' Theorem and conditional probability.

name: Introduction to Object-Oriented Design
description: Learn the basic principles of object-oriented design, including encapsulation and abstraction.

lessons.name: Encapsulation
lessons.description: Understanding encapsulation and how to apply it in OOP.

lessons.name: Abstraction
lessons.description: Learning abstraction in the context of object-oriented programming.

lessons.name: Encapsulation vs. Abstraction
lessons.description: Differentiating between encapsulation and abstraction.

name: Inheritance and Polymorphism
description: Explore inheritance and polymorphism in object-oriented design.

lessons.name: Inheritance
lessons.description: Understanding how inheritance works and its use in OOP.

lessons.name: Polymorphism
lessons.description: Exploring polymorphism and how it allows different behaviors for different object types.

lessons.name: Method Overriding
lessons.description: Understanding how to override methods in object-oriented design.

name: Design Patterns
description: Introduction to common design patterns used in object-oriented design.

lessons.name: Factory Pattern
lessons.description: Understanding the factory design pattern and its use.

lessons.name: Singleton Pattern
lessons.description: Exploring the singleton pattern and how it ensures a class has only one instance.

lessons.name: Observer Pattern
lessons.description: Learning the observer pattern for defining a subscription mechanism.

name: Linear Data Structures
description: Explore fundamental linear data structures such as arrays, stacks, and queues.

lessons.name: Arrays
lessons.description: Introduction to arrays, their operations, and complexity.

lessons.name: Stacks
lessons.description: Understanding stacks and how to implement them.

lessons.name: Queues
lessons.description: Learn about queue operations and their applications.

name: Non-linear Data Structures
description: Learn about non-linear data structures like trees and graphs.

lessons.name: Trees
lessons.description: Introduction to binary trees and their traversals.

lessons.name: Graphs
lessons.description: Understanding graphs and common algorithms like BFS and DFS.

lessons.name: Graph Applications
lessons.description: Applications of graphs in networking and pathfinding.

name: Hashing and Hash Tables
description: Learn about hashing, hash functions, and hash tables.

lessons.name: Hash Functions
lessons.description: Introduction to hash functions and their properties.

lessons.name: Collision Resolution
lessons.description: Understanding collision resolution strategies in hash tables.

lessons.name: Applications of Hash Tables
lessons.description: Real-world applications of hash tables.

name: Algorithm Basics
description: Introduction to algorithmic thinking and basic sorting algorithms.

lessons.name: Algorithm Analysis
lessons.description: Understanding algorithm efficiency and big O notation.

lessons.name: Sorting Algorithms
lessons.description: Introduction to basic sorting algorithms like quicksort and mergesort.

lessons.name: Divide and Conquer
lessons.description: Learning the divide and conquer approach in algorithms.

name: Dynamic Programming
description: Learn about dynamic programming and its applications in algorithms.

lessons.name: Introduction to Dynamic Programming
lessons.description: Understanding the basics of dynamic programming.

lessons.name: Memoization
lessons.description: Learning memoization techniques for optimizing algorithms.

lessons.name: Applications of Dynamic Programming
lessons.description: Exploring classic dynamic programming problems.

name: Graph Algorithms
description: Explore common algorithms used in graphs such as shortest path algorithms.

lessons.name: Shortest Path Algorithms
lessons.description: Introduction to Dijkstra and Bellman-Ford algorithms.

lessons.name: Minimum Spanning Tree
lessons.description: Learning Kruskal's and Prim's algorithms for finding MST.

lessons.name: Network Flow Algorithms
lessons.description: Exploring network flow and max-flow algorithms.

name: Database Design
description: Introduction to database design principles and relational models.

lessons.name: Relational Model
lessons.description: Understanding the relational database model and normalization.

lessons.name: ER Diagrams
lessons.description: Creating Entity-Relationship diagrams for database design.

lessons.name: Normalization
lessons.description: Understanding normalization techniques to eliminate redundancy.

name: SQL Basics
description: Learn the fundamentals of SQL for querying relational databases.

lessons.name: Basic Queries
lessons.description: Introduction to SELECT statements and basic SQL queries.

lessons.name: Joins
lessons.description: Understanding different types of joins in SQL.

lessons.name: Subqueries
lessons.description: Learn how to use subqueries in SQL.

name: Transactions and Concurrency
description: Explore database transactions, ACID properties, and concurrency control.

lessons.name: Transactions and ACID
lessons.description: Understanding database transactions and ACID properties.

lessons.name: Concurrency Control
lessons.description: Exploring techniques for managing concurrent transactions.

lessons.name: Isolation Levels
lessons.description: Understanding different isolation levels in database transactions.

name: Cloud Infrastructure
description: Introduction to cloud infrastructure and services.

lessons.name: Virtualization
lessons.description: Understanding virtualization and its role in cloud infrastructure.

lessons.name: Cloud Providers
lessons.description: Exploring popular cloud providers such as AWS, Azure, and GCP.

lessons.name: Cloud Storage
lessons.description: Understanding cloud storage services and their use cases.

name: Cloud Security
description: Learn about security challenges and solutions in cloud computing.

lessons.name: Security Models
lessons.description: Understanding the security models used in cloud environments.

lessons.name: Encryption
lessons.description: Exploring encryption techniques for data security in the cloud.

lessons.name: Identity and Access Management
lessons.description: Managing identities and access control in cloud environments.

name: Cloud Scalability
description: Learn how to design and implement scalable systems in the cloud.

lessons.name: Load Balancing
lessons.description: Introduction to load balancing for cloud applications.

lessons.name: Auto-scaling
lessons.description: Understanding auto-scaling techniques in the cloud.

lessons.name: Monitoring and Management
lessons.description: Learn how to monitor and manage cloud resources.
